channel.title: How to add shops
channel.description: Ok well the title is pretty self-explanatory but i was wondering what else i have to add other than the npc and add to shops.cfg to make a shop. I know this is a noobish question but i quit coding for like a year and i 4got how, and yes i have looked in the tut section and all teh links i found in other post are old and not working so please some1 who knows how to do this please psot here
